text: aur ham ahale saba aur (shaam) kee un bastiyon ke daramiyaan jinamen hamane barakat ata kee thee aur chand bastiyaan (sare raah) aabaad kee thee jo baaham numaaya theen aur hamane unamen aamad va rapht kee raah muqarrar kee thee ki unamen raaton ko dinon ko (jab jee chaahe) bekhatake chalo phiro
